ygData.subject: Re: Stats on reinforced or studded leather
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/19/99 3:50:31 AM Eastern Daylight Time, EQCheats@onelist.com writes: Drew Simonis wrote: Does anyone have these stats?  I have been
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/19/99 3:50:31 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
EQCheats@onelist.com writes:

Drew Simonis wrote:
Does anyone have these stats? I have been looking for these items, but it
seems that no one makes them! I would love to see the stats and determine if
my search is worth while. I would be willing to discard my quite common
banded armor in favor of this if the AC were not too much lower, just for the
sake of RP'ing...


Studded is handmade armor and actually not to commonly used from what
I've asked people. Reinforced can normally be found on Druids in the midlevel
ranges before they get strong or wealthy enough to get better armor. Ask a
few Druids in the mid teens what they are using and the stats if they could
as they are restricted to wearing no metal armor.
